description:
A trio of unsuspecting mermaids find themselves in hot water after releasing a bad guy from his barrel of a prison. Over at the royal palace, Luffy gets up close and personal with the Mermaid Princess!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Guidés par le requin reconnaissant ! Direction : le palais Ryûgû !
The Ryugu Palace! Taken by the Shark That They Saved!
Дворец Рьюгу! Следуя за спасенной акулой!
قصر ريوغو! على متن القرش الذي أنقذوه!
竜宮城! 助けた鮫に連れられて
